TestCase.name: testTernaryUnion
TestCase.Resource: LogicalUnion(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 2)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a], where=[>(b, 2)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testUnion
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[false]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, b, c]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testUnionWithStats
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[false]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, b, c]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testUnionAll
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 2)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a, c]) :- Calc(select=[a, c], where=[>(a, 2)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a, c], where=[>(a, 2)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
